com.bazaarvoice
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  com.bazaarvoice.Utils

public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object

Contains various utilities; some are used within the SDK, others are intended to help developers with tasks relevant to SDK features.

Created on 7/9/12. Copyright (c) 2012 BazaarVoice. All rights reserved.

Author:
Bazaarvoice Engineering

getCameraImages

public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getCameraImages()
This method reads the SD card and gets a list of all jpegs found on it under the DCIM directory.

Returns:
the list of jpg files

getCameraVideos

public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getCameraVideos()
This method reads the SD card and gets a list of all 3gp videos found on it under the DCIM directory.

Returns:
the list of 3gp files

Parameters:
